original: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nakusalo dhammo
analyzed: anidassana appaṭigham kusalam dhammam paṭicca na anidassana appaṭighaḥ na kusalaḥ dhammaḥ

original: uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho
analyzed: uppajjati hetu paccayā anidassana appaṭigham kusalam dhammam paṭicca na sa nidassana sappaṭighaḥ

original: nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe… anidassanaappaṭighaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
analyzed: na kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā pe anidassana appaṭigham kusalam dhammam paṭicca

original: nasanidassanasappaṭigho nakusalo ca naanidassanasappaṭigho nakusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti
analyzed: na sanidassana sappaṭighaḥ na kusalaḥ ca na anidassana sappaṭighaḥ na kusalaḥ ca dhammā uppajjanti

original: hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha …pe… avigate cha.
analyzed: hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā cha adhipatiyā cha pe avigate cha

original: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho naakusalo dhammo
analyzed: anidassana appaṭigham akusalam dhammam paṭicca na anidassana appaṭighaḥ na akusalaḥ dhammaḥ

original: uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho
analyzed: uppajjati hetu paccayā anidassana appaṭigham akusalam dhammam paṭicca na sa nidassana sappaṭighaḥ

original: nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe… anidassanaappaṭighaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ
analyzed: na kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā pe anidassana appaṭigham akusalam dhamma

original: paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nakusalo ca naanidassanasappaṭigho naakusalo ca dhammā
analyzed: paṭicca na sa nidassana sappaṭighaḥ na kusalaḥ ca na a nidassana sappaṭighaḥ na akusalaḥ ca dhammā

original: uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha …pe… avigate cha
analyzed: uppajjanti hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā cha adhipatiyā cha pe avigate cha

original: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nasanidassanasappaṭigho naabyākato
analyzed: a nidassana appaṭigham abyākatam dhammam paccayā na sa nidassana sappaṭighaḥ na abyākataḥ

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paccayā naanidassanasappaṭigho
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā anidassana appaṭigham abyākatam dhammam paccayā na anidassana sappaṭighaḥ

original: naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paccayā
analyzed: na abyākataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā anidassana appaṭigham abyākatam dhammam paccayā

original: nasanidassanasappaṭigho naabyākato ca naanidassanasappaṭigho naabyākato ca dhammā
analyzed: na sa nidassana sappaṭighaḥ na abyākataḥ ca na anidassana sappaṭighaḥ na abyākataḥ ca dhammā

original: uppajjanti hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: uppajjanti hetu paccayā hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
